Html:
Would not be interesting if typescript will add "macros"?

I wold expected something more "coffeescriptish" from typescript.

The javascript language is soooo verbose.
Do you have specific types of macros you're looking for (or specific things you want made easier)?

For example at this stage we do not have constructs like those in Coffeescript or c#:

foreach x in y {

}

foreach x of y {

}

repeat { } n times

linq to js      var query = from a in arr where (a>0);

Macros could be useful to implement some kind o internal DSLs...
